channel.title: Question!?!?!? (i needed it 10 - 15 minutes ago!?!?)
channel.description: I ALREADY POSTED BELLOW BUT NO ONE FRIGGEN ANSWERS, IS THERE AN IP-BAN/IP-MUTE FOR 562 SOURCES OR NO? IF NOT THEN POST SO BELLOW PLEASE. IF THERE IS HOW-EVER, PLEASE POST IT BELLOW. PL0X!

item.title: Question!?!?!? (i needed it 10 - 15 minutes ago!?!?)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“abcpker711, post:5, topic:339878”]WOW… In all of your disturbing yet faggot ass rambling on, I didn’t learn shit. (Please Hurry!) doesn’t mean anything? I needed it THEN, and STILL fucking need it. So if your nerd ass is going to sit here and fuck with me, all three of you, if you got a 562… Post it XD I’ll easly make myself Admin, AND crash it. Thank you, verry much. Narbs.

~ P.S. Fuck you ~[/quote]
say’s the guy who couldn’t create an ipban command.

also, i can’t believe you’re calling us nerds when you’re asking our help. what kind of shit is inside your head? obviously it’s worse than the brown one, but maybe (just maybe) its donkey poo in there? also, WHY DON’T YOU FUCKING USE NERD ASS GOOGLE, YOU DISTURBING YET ASS (NERD) FAGGOT?

So if your nerd ass is going to sit here and fuck with me, all three of you, if you got a 562… Post it XD I’ll easly make myself Admin, AND crash it. Thank you, verry much. Narbs.

~ P.S. Fuck you ~

You’re expecting to be spoon-fed, not taught. If you truly want to learn, go Google some tutorials.

To add on there is a section full of tutorials here at Mopar.

[/quote]

I read them… :o[/quote]
Well, I mean, they’re not all horrible, just the majority of them.

Again, welcome to the wonderful world of Moparscape. Keep in mind there is ALWAYS IP banning or IP muting for every source known to man. It simply requires the following:

Instead of bitching at other community members for answers, learn to code! Some members are nice enough to release their work on their own accord, not yours!

Please refrain from future misuses of the forum.

Thanks
